item.title: PI, Need help with custom chest
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

Alright well, I coded this custom chest, but there is something wrong, because when i click it, it does nothing…

case 378: c.sendMessage("300 keys: Spectral spirit shield"); c.sendMessage("130 keys: Dragon Claws"); c.sendMessage("100 keys: Armadyl godsword"); c.sendMessage("70 keys: Bandos ChestPlate"); c.sendMessage("40 keys: Yellow Whip"); } if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(2944, 300)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(2944, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2944), 300); c.getItems().addItem(13744, 1); c.sendMessage("You have used you're points on a Spectral spirit shield!"); } else { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(2944, 130)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(2944, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2944), 130); c.getItems().addItem(14484, 1); c.sendMessage("You have used you're points on dragon claws!"); } else { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(2944, 100)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(2944, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2944), 100); c.getItems().addItem(11694, 1); c.sendMessage("You have used you're points on a Armadyl godsword!"); } else { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(2944, 70)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(2944, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2944), 70); c.getItems().addItem(11724, 1); c.sendMessage("You have used you're points on a bandos Chestplate!"); } else { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(2944, 40)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(2944, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2944), 40); c.getItems().addItem(15441, 1); c.sendMessage("You have used you're points on a yellow whip!"); } else { c.sendMessage("You Do Not have enough keys to buy anything..."); } } } } break;
I am thinking it is because how many closing brackets there are at the end, but I need them there to compile.

Read full topic
item.source: PI, Need help with custom chest
